property.name: DefenderBriefing
property.value:
An enemy commander has initiated a FACTORY BEACHHEAD operation on a valuable factory planet you are defending! The attacker's goal will be to defeat your forces so that they may safely land dropships and begin deploying ground forces. Your job is to stop them.

Because this planet is fortified by our forces, you will be able to call in artillery strikes from beyond the battlefield. Use this advantage to deny the enemy cover and to generally keep them on the move.

Success in this operation may very well determine the course of this war, so fight hard and good luck!

OPERATION FEATURES:
* Attacker Mechs and Infantry Only -- attacker is limited to units that can be dropped from the air
* Attacker Center Deployment Chance: 33% -- the attacker is dropping in the middle of an area you control
* Defender Artillery: 1 artillery unit (type depends on BV), deployed off-board

VICTORY CONDITIONS (All-Out Battle):
* Force opponent to surrender OR trigger auto-victory
* Auto-victory triggered when 1) 60% of enemy BV destroyed, and 2) friendly BV is 150% of enemy BV

BATTLE OUTCOMES:
* Land Exchange (HIGH): 2000 BV: ~28 CP / 4000 BV: ~36 CP / 6000 BV: ~44 CP
* Intelligence (HIGH): +2 Intel
* Influence (HIGH): 2000 BV: ~60 flu / 4000 BV: ~100 flu / 6000 BV: ~140 flu
* Operation Pay (HIGH): 2000 BV: ~4,352 CBills / 4000 BV: ~7,552 CBills / 6000 BV: ~10,752 CBills
* Loss Penalty: -20% if defeated -- standard loss penalty
* Dishonorable Surrender: ADDITIONAL -20% pay if you surrender before a 20% BV loss
* Salvage (Favors Defender): 60% friendly/30% enemy-- you control the planet and have salvaging advantage

***END BRIEFING***

property.name: AttackerBriefing
property.value:
You have launched a FACTORY BEACHHEAD operation, a high-stakes battle to open a landing zone on a valuable factory planet! Your force will be dropping from altitude, after which you are to eliminate any hostile forces you encounter and secure a landing zone.

As this is a fortified planet, with significant defenses, you should expect the defender to be able to call in artillery strikes from beyond the battlefield. It will therefore be advisable to stay on the move.

Success in this operation may very well determine the course of this war, so fight hard and good luck!

OPERATION FEATURES:
* Attacker is Mechs and Infantry Only -- you can only use units that can be dropped from the air
* Center Deployment Chance: 33% -- landing in a contested area, the enemy could come from any direction
* Defender Artillery: 1 artillery unit (type depends on BV), deployed off-board

VICTORY CONDITIONS (All-Out Battle):
* Force opponent to surrender OR trigger auto-victory
* Auto-victory triggered when 1) 60% of enemy BV destroyed, and 2) friendly BV is 150% of enemy BV

BATTLE OUTCOMES:
* Land Exchange (Standard): 2000 BV: ~14 CP / 4000 BV: ~18 CP / 6000 BV: ~22 CP
* Intelligence (None): No Intel for attacker
* Influence (None): No influence for attacker
* Operation Pay (MEDIUM): 2000 BV: ~3,627 CBills / 4000 BV: ~6,293 CBills / 6000 BV: ~8,960 CBills
* Loss Penalty: -20% if defeated -- standard loss penalty
* Dishonorable Surrender: ADDITIONAL -20% pay if you surrender before a 20% BV loss
* Salvage (Favors Defender): 30% friendly/60% enemy -- enemy controls planet and has salvaging advantage

***END BRIEFING***
